title: E186 The Patron Saint of Porches and the Age of the Spinster
description: Join us for ghost brunch this weekend, won't you? For episode 186, Em's taking us to Charleston, South Carolina, specifically a local haunted brunch spot called Poogan's Porch. Then Christine covers the unsolved case of Texas fitness instructor Missy Bevers. And we're sorry for calling you out for your OBX bumper sticker... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
